description:
The Business Strategy & Operations organization provides business critical insights using analytics, ensures cross functional alignment of goals and execution, and helps teams drive strategic partnerships and new initiatives forward. We stay focused on aligning the highest-level company priorities with strong day-to-day operations, and help evolve early stage ideas into future-growth initiatives.

The GCS Product and Sales Activation (PSA) team is responsible for developing performance and brand product solutions for Small and Medium Businesses globally. We are the product and business experts behind the thousands of GCS Googlers are responsible for driving sustainable revenue growth and product adoption. We identify opportunities through data-driven analysis, develop business cases for those opportunities, build consensus with stakeholders, and program manage cross-functional teams to drive GCS advertiser success and business growth.

As the Global Measurement Product Lead, you will lead areas within Performance Measurement (e.g., Conversion Tracking, Attribution, Google Analytics, Google Attribution) and will be responsible for product adoption and business growth. You'll be an expert in Measurement products, features, and tools, while deeply understanding how the small and medium-sized business (SMB) customer engages with our products, and taking this information to help shape the product roadmap. You will analyze data to uncover opportunities and to accelerate adoption growth, building models to determine addressable audience, business impact and opportunity areas. You will advocate for SMB Measurement opportunities, engaging with the various Product, Marketing, and SMB teams (Acquisitions, Channel Sales, SMB Sales and Services) to drive your agenda and to help drive Global SMB Search business.

When our millions of advertisers and publishers are happy, so are we! Our Google Customer Solutions (GCS) team of entrepreneurial, enthusiastic and client-focused members are the "human face" of Google, helping entrepreneurs both individually and broadly build their online presence and grow their businesses. We are dedicated to growing the unique needs of advertising companies. Our teams of strategists, analysts, advisers and support specialists collaborate closely to spot and analyze customer needs and trends. Together, we create and implement business plans broadly for all types of businesses.
eeo: At Google, we don’t just accept difference—we celebrate it, we support it, and we thrive on it for the benefit of our employees, our products and our community. Google is proud to be an equal opportunity workplace and is an affirmative action employer. We are committed to equal employment opportunity regardless of race, color, ancestry, religion, sex, national origin, sexual orientation, age, citizenship, marital status, disability, gender identity or Veteran status. qualifications:
Minimum qualifications:

  • Experience with Google Ads.
  • Experience in data analysis.
  • 5 years relevant experience in Sales Operations, Financial or Business Analysis, or Management Consulting.

Preferred qualifications:

  • 7 years relevant experience in Sales Operations, Financial or Business Analysis, or Management Consulting.
  • Knowledge of performance advertising for SMB organizations..
  • Strategic thinking with ability to lead complex operational and strategic initiatives; Distinctive problem-solving and analytical skills, combined with impeccable business judgment.
  • Ability to work, collaborate and influence cross-functionally. Ability to set a goal and vision for virtual team and translate this into tactical quarterly goals.
  • Ability to craft a story and influence an audience with data.
  • Excellent communication skills; ability to present solutions to senior-level audiences and to communicate with highly technical Management and Product teams.
responsibilities:
• Become subject matter expert for Google Ads Measurement products and support activation plans for your key product launches.
  • Define GCS Measurement product and go-to-market strategy.
  • Work with Product, Marketing, and Operations to identify and size market and customer opportunities. Plan and manage programs to execute against strategies. Partner with Sales Leadership on achieving goals regionally and globally.
  • Identify key product needs across GCS (Sales, Acquisitions, Services), and link with Product to agree action plan.
  • Use customer data and trends to develop scalable global solutions for client interaction, sales and services. Develop and refine best practices and collateral.
title: Global Measurement Product Lead, Product and Sales Activation, Google Customer Solutions
